item.description: How about meeting up in Winthrop at Crystal Cove (there is a public boat launch there, or you can bypass it and just drop it in a few hundred feet from the launch where there's a little beachfront. We could paddle out to the Logan runway in this sheltered harbor area, and along the shoreline (for kayakers of only modest experience such as myself :-) over mussel shoals in relatively protected waters, up to (and into, if we go at the high tide) and into the lovely Belle Isle saltmarsh/reservation. Maybe pull up for a picnic in the reservation, or go to one of the little restaurants around the reservation, then paddle back to winthrop. Parking is available at the launch point for a small fee, and there is some onstreet parking available in the immediate area as well...
item.name: Crystal Cove to Belle Isle Marsh/Reservation and back...
